description: Gets details of the past fraud predictions for the specified event ID, event type, detector ID, and detector version ID that was generated in the specified time period.

parameters.name: eventTypeName
parameters.description: The event type associated with the detector specified for the prediction.

parameters.name: predictionTimestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp that defines when the prediction was generated. The timestamp must be specified using ISO 8601 standard in UTC. We recommend calling ListEventPredictions first, and using the predictionTimestamp value in the response to provide an accurate prediction timestamp value.

nested_items.name: eventId
nested_items.description: The event ID.

nested_items.name: eventTypeName
nested_items.description: The event type associated with the detector specified for this prediction.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The entity ID.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The entity type.

nested_items.name: eventTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the prediction was generated for the associated event ID.

nested_items.name: detectorId
nested_items.description: The detector ID.

nested_items.name: detectorVersionId
nested_items.description: The detector version ID.

nested_items.name: detectorVersionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the detector version.

nested_items.name: eventVariables
nested_items.description: A list of event variables that influenced the prediction scores.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The event variable name.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the event variable.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The event variable source.

nested_items.name: rules
nested_items.description: List of rules associated with the detector version that were used for evaluating variable values.

nested_items.name: ruleId
nested_items.description: The rule ID.

nested_items.name: ruleVersion
nested_items.description: The rule version.

nested_items.name: expression
nested_items.description: The rule expression.

nested_items.name: expressionWithValues
nested_items.description: The rule expression value.

nested_items.name: outcomes
nested_items.description: The rule outcome.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: evaluated
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the rule was evaluated.

nested_items.name: matched
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the rule matched.

nested_items.name: ruleExecutionMode
nested_items.description: The execution mode of the rule used for evaluating variable values.

nested_items.name: outcomes
nested_items.description: The outcomes of the matched rule, based on the rule execution mode.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: evaluatedModelVersions
nested_items.description: Model versions that were evaluated for generating predictions.

nested_items.name: modelId
nested_items.description: The model ID.

nested_items.name: modelVersion
nested_items.description: The model version.

nested_items.name: modelType
nested_items.description: The model type.

nested_items.name: evaluations
nested_items.description: Evaluations generated for the model version.

nested_items.name: outputVariableName
nested_items.description: The output variable name.

nested_items.name: evaluationScore
nested_items.description: The evaluation score generated for the model version.

nested_items.name: predictionExplanations
nested_items.description: The prediction explanations generated for the model version.

nested_items.name: variableImpactExplanations
nested_items.description: The details of the event variable's impact on the prediction score.

nested_items.name: eventVariableName
nested_items.description: The event variable name.

nested_items.name: relativeImpact
nested_items.description: The event variable's relative impact in terms of magnitude on the prediction scores. The relative impact values consist of a numerical rating (0-5, 5 being the highest) and direction (increased/decreased) impact of the fraud risk.

nested_items.name: logOddsImpact
nested_items.description: The raw, uninterpreted value represented as log-odds of the fraud. These values are usually between -10 to +10, but range from - infinity to + infinity.
A positive value indicates that the variable drove the risk score up.
A negative value indicates that the variable drove the risk score down.

nested_items.name: aggregatedVariablesImpactExplanations
nested_items.description: The details of the aggregated variables impact on the prediction score.

nested_items.name: eventVariableNames
nested_items.description: The names of all the event variables that were used to derive the aggregated variables.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relativeImpact
nested_items.description: The relative impact of the aggregated variables in terms of magnitude on the prediction scores.

nested_items.name: logOddsImpact
nested_items.description: The raw, uninterpreted value represented as log-odds of the fraud. These values are usually between -10 to +10, but range from -infinity to +infinity.
A positive value indicates that the variables drove the risk score up.
A negative value indicates that the variables drove the risk score down.

nested_items.name: evaluatedExternalModels
nested_items.description: models that were evaluated for generating predictions.

nested_items.name: modelEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of the external (Amazon Sagemaker) model.

nested_items.name: useEventVariables
nested_items.description: Indicates whether event variables were used to generate predictions.

nested_items.name: inputVariables
nested_items.description: Input variables use for generating predictions.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: outputVariables
nested_items.description: Output variables.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: predictionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp that defines when the prediction was generated.
